name: 28 Days/Weeks Later Collection
overview: A post-apocalyptic horror film series focused on survivors of a blood-borne disease called Rage that turns the infected into mindless, zombie-like savages, the hordes of whom have decimated the population of Great Britain.

parts.overview: Twenty-eight days after a killer virus was accidentally unleashed from a British research facility, a small group of London survivors are caught in a desperate struggle to protect themselves from the infected. Carried by animals and humans, the virus turns those it infects into homicidal maniacs -- and it's absolutely impossible to contain.
parts.title: 28 Days Later

parts.overview: The inhabitants of the British Isles have lost their battle against the onslaught of disease, as the deadly rage virus has killed every citizen there. Six months later, a group of Americans dare to set foot on the isles, convinced the danger has come and gone. But it soon becomes all too clear that the scourge continues to live, waiting to pounce on its next victims.
parts.title: 28 Weeks Later

parts.overview: The third instalment in the 28 Days Later franchise and first in a new trilogy. Premise TBA.
parts.title: 28 Years Later

parts.original_title: 28 Years Later Part 2: The Bone Temple
parts.overview: The second installment in the 28 Days Later sequel trilogy. Premise TBA.
parts.title: 28 Years Later Part 2: The Bone Temple

parts.overview: The third installment in the 28 Days Later sequel trilogy. Premise TBA.
parts.title: 28 Years Later Part 3
